resources.string: Ah outside. Birds are chirping, flowers are blooming. And you hear bees? … Oh frick those are killer wasps! RUN!
It is morning. You wake up to your phone buzzing. It is time for a new day and you have a job, better get there fast!
THIS IS THE LAST TIME, YOU ARE FIRED
You hate this dang job. A man just entered your office and started blasting at you like crazy. Customers should always be wrong. How will you respond to this treason?

You once saw this Chinese movie, so you try something out. Time slows and you strike his weak spots, and as you blow out your smoking fingers, the man collapses without a sound. You should flee this country now.
What a catastrophic day, that guy was done like good job holy hell. You sit on a bench multiple kilometers away. What now?
After today it is reasonable to want to change identities, I know a guy. I will introduce you.
You took a nice rest. But what\'s this?
Because of your repeated offenses (this is not the first time), you are now fired. Great! Whatever can you do next?
Your beauty sleep is too important, screw the world am I right? Before you sleep you decide to take a selfie.
All you did today was sleep, how productive. What will you do now?
So much for not staying indoors all day, but wasps don\'t take prisoners. What now?
*sigh* fine, guess sleeping in more can\'t be worse than what you did all day. Sleep well
Bully the creator of this app.
Yeah that does sound fun! Don\'t hold back tiger.
